name: Asteroid (DevParty)
description:
Oh no! It seems that there is a massive asteroid heading directly towards earth!

You have been tasked with stopping the asteroid, but, what can just one man do? Well, it doesn't really matter because if you mess up its not really your problem anymore, but it would be kind of cool to stop it anyway.

Well, without further ado, press that play button and good luck to you!

If you want to see the dev process, I will have a video up on my YT at some point.
